item.title: [video] – How is Hadoop used at Twitter?
item.description: In the following video Dmitriy Ryaboy, a Twitter Analytics Engineer and a former Cloudera Intern, explains how Twitter uses Hadoop and Pig. Enjoy the video and have a good weekend! [vimeo 11110059] Related articles
